H0.text: What U.S. state borders four Great Lakes. US-IL

H1.text: What U.S. state borders four Great Lakes. US-OH

H2.text: What U.S. state borders four Great Lakes. US-MN

H3.text: What U.S. state borders four Great Lakes. US-MI

A4.text: The Great Lakes that border Michigan from east to west are Lake Erie, Lake Huron, Lake Michigan and Lake Superior.

A5.text: Bordering four of the five Great Lakes and Lake St. Clair, Michigan has the longest freshwater coastline of any U.S. political subdivision, measuring 3,288 miles.
